descriptionHtml:
Shocks More Useful Potions

by - UWShocks
--No DLC required.
============================================================================
[color=red]Adds 5 new Lore-Friendly potions to the game.[/color]
--Can be crafted at a cookpot.
--Mod does not add new scripts; can be safely uninstalled.
============================================================================
[color=red]Potions:[/color]

[color=yellow]ShadowBanish Wine[/color]
--Gives the player improved nightvision for 5 minutes
--Lore: [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Shadowbanish_Wine]http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Shadowbanish_Wine[/url]
--Recipe: 5 GlowMushrooms and 1 bottle of Wine [there are 2 versions of wine, the recipe wants the wine with the threading on the bottle].

[color=yellow]RoseThorn Mead[/color]
--Gives the player a Berserk Rage, which blocks 75% of incoming damage, and the player deal double the damage for 15 seconds.
--Lore: [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Rosethorn_Mead]http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Rosethorn_Mead[/url]
--Recipe: 10 Fly Amanita, 1 bottle of Nord Mead.

[color=yellow]Potion of the Blades[/color]
--Player deals 25% more damage to Dragons; Dragons deal 25% less damage to player. Lasts 5 minutes
--Recipe: 5x of 3 mushroom varieties [sorry, I forget the exact mushrooms needed].

[color=yellow]Potion of Haste[/color]
--Doubles the speed of the player for 300 seconds.
--Lore: idea from Morrowind Skooma [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Skooma_(Morrowind)]http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Skooma_(Morrowind)[/url]
--Recipe: 1 blue dart [dragonfly], 5 red mountain flowers

[color=yellow]Potion of Talos[/color]
--Reduces Shout cooldown by 50% for 5 minutes
--Recipe: 10 DragonTongues [flower].



**I would usually use the UESP [Unofficial Elder Scroll Pages]; but the Elder Scrolls Wiki had better articles.
